ygData.subject: Re: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would *never* hit on someone.  When I play my females, I just giggle and bat my eyes a lot.  Works like a charm.  We men are such suckers... ... I get
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > Harm, you're killin' me! hehe
> > While you're at it, you should twink the cute ones. ;)
>
> Are you hitting on me? hehehe. No, I wont do your lambent quests
> for you damnit. <g>
>

I would *never* hit on someone. When I play my females, I just giggle and bat my eyes a lot. Works like
a charm. We men are such suckers...

>
> Some dude in Qeynos (L1 bard) last night was like
>
> Somedude tells you 'sup bro, come twink me up ;)'
> /reply hehe, a bard huh? who are you really? =)
> Somedude tells you 'I'm Somedude, Level 1 bard'
> /reply so I don't know you as someone else?
> Somedude tells you 'nope'
>
> Argh, /who all bard 50 - I hate being anonymous, but I hate out of
> the blue doodoo like that.
>
> Harmonic.

I get this all the time when I'm at the bank. The other night I got a tell from a level four bard asking
if I could help a poor fellow bard buy their level four song. Remembering how hard the first few levels
were, I turned around to take a look. She was in full bronze! What, her twinker was too cheap to give
her 50 plat? Of course, she was a wood elf, so I had to cough it up. (See sucker comment, above...)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
